mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NICK, MEM_PHONE, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADDR, MEM_BDATE, MEM_DEPT, MEM_EMAIL, DON_RECEIPT, MEM_SSN, EMAIL_AGREE, SMS_AGREE, MEM_STAT, MEM_NAME ) VALUES ( #{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{memNick}, #{memPhone}, #{memZip}, #{memAddr}, #{memBdate}, #{memDept}, #{memEmail}, #{donReceipt}, #{memSsn}, #{emailAgree}, #{smsAgree}, (UPPER(#{memStat})), #{memName} )
mapper.select: select MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NICK, MEM_PHONE, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADDR, MEM_BDATE, MEM_DEPT, MEM_EMAIL, DON_RECEIPT, MEM_SSN, EMAIL_AGREE, SMS_AGREE, ACCT_NUM, BANK_NAME, upper(MEM_STAT) as MEM_STAT, MEM_NAME from member where MEM_ID = #{memId}
select sub_code_id as id , sub_code_name as name from sub_code where main_code_id = 'd' or main_code_id = 'f'
select count(*) from facility where biz_num = #{biz_num}
